text: Albanian Cycling Federation (FSHÇ) is the main national governing body for cycle sport in Albania. FSHÇ is a member of the Union Cycliste Internationale (UCI) and Union Européenne de Cyclisme (UET). Founded in 1925, it is the 3rd oldest cycling federation in Europe.Historiku i Çiklizmit në Shqipëri == See also == *List of Albanian cyclists *Sports in Albania *Tour of Albania *Balkan Elite Road Classics == References == Category:Cycle racing organizations Cycling Category:Sports organizations established in 1925 Category:1925 establishments in Albania
title: Albanian Cycling Federation
